pages.text: Vagrants above Tier 1 have sometimes been spotted leaping short distances, much like a Rupter. This behavior appears to be used as a method of quick travel, or scaling small gaps in terrain. Some especially astute Vagrants may time their Leaps with a jump while sprinting to launch themselves farther, at the cost of height.

$(#630000)I can do this with $(k:srpcotesia.leap). Leaps require that I am on the ground when I use them, but only have a half-second cooldown. Using this capability extensively appears to be my fastest method of cheap travel, at least on foot.
